Vocopter

VoCopter is a voice controlled video game, written using the JUCE framework. It converts a raw MIDI file into obstacles. Player has to maneuver the copter through the obstacles by singing the right pitch.

  • Date: April 2016
  • Category: Realtime DSP

Moog Hackathon

Second runner up in Moog Hackathon held at Georgia Tech Centre for Music Technology. A 3D printed object with touch sensors and Inertial Measurement Unit controls a synthesizer based on Gesture Recognition. The synthesizer output runs through a glass plate reverb for acoustic effect.

  • Date: Spring 2015
  • Category: MCUs, Electronics, Synthesizers

Euclidean Beatgen

An app to make Euclidean Rhythms based on Bjorklund's Algorithm. Written on Max/MSP using Javascript. Click here for video demo.

  • Date: Spring 2015
  • Category: Max/MSP, JavaScript

Electrical Engineer

Was an Electrical Engineer at Kickr Design LLC. Helped prototype engineering products for clients, and took care of electronics/electrical aspests.

  • Date: Spring 2016
  • Category: MCUs, Electrical Engineering, Prototyping

Audio Software Intern

Wrote testcases for their core DSP algorithms in C++. Was a part of their Kickstarter campaign.

  • Date: Summer 2015
  • Category: C++, DSP
